Description: The domain is in a normal state.

The domain has an assigned registration, 
        but the delegation is inactive.

The domain is in the process of being purged from
        the database.

The domain is pending a change in
        authority.
The domain is on hold by the registry.

The domain has a known status, but it is not one of
        the redefined enumerated values.
The domain has an unknown status.

A value used to indicate that this attribute is
        extended and the actual value is provided using the
        corresponding ext-* attribute.  See Section 5.1.1 of [RFC7970].
